comment: While of course it'd be optimal to hear both programs , if forced to choose , I'd take /29 . Personally I don't need to hear another Appassionata and would happily opt for Opp . & . Plus it's a chance to hear both Sweelinck & Benjamin , when does that happen ?

comment: Schwantner s music is glorious , and played far too seldom . He is a virtuoso at handling orchestral forces , something Gil Rose surely will show and savor . Absolutely would be my choice . Here s the Pulitzer-winning Aftertones of Infinity , for a taste . <URL>
